abstract.p: Narration of miracles worked by Mary after her death on several groups of women: First, she is visited by a group of noble women, who wish to adore her and to be given explanations on the life of Christ. Before returning to their countries, Mary blesses them. Then, other women arrive who are possessed by a demon and who are healed by Mary's prayer. This miracle seems to be identical to . Lastly, a woman suffering from fever and a woman afflicted with a demon in her right eye are healed by Mary.
